title: Monster Moving Day
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 230 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 450L, Fiction Series
description: Bonk has a problem. His house is filled from corner to corner with collections. Jupe suggests that Bonk move to a bigger house. But Bonk loves his home and his collections. How will he solve his problem? Monster Moving Day provides an excellent opportunity to introduce problem and solution to students. Pictures support the text.
